title: Stop Taking Babies into Movie Theaters! - The Kinda Funny Morning Show 04.06.18
description:
Andy and Nick talk about the top movie rentals of 2017, new promo artwork for Avengers: Infinity War, the decline in movie theater attendance, and why it’s important that you keep your crying child the hell away from Nick.

-The accountant was the most rented movie of 2017 (23:50 mins)
-Avengers art & Antman art (39:19 mins)
-US Theaters see lowest audiences for 23 years (42:25 mins)
-Abandoned Terminator Genisys sequel plot focused on cyborg John Connor (45:30 mins)
-Movies out this week (47:55 mins)
Thanks to https://Twitter.com/kumailh for our timestamps!

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.
